availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, carpenter. Maryland native. Married Frances D. Christopher. Father of Sarah F. Christopher, John H. Christopher, Lucy P. Christopher, Mary Christopher, Edward W. Christopher, and Charles Chirstopher. Married Fannie H. Christopher. Father of Frank B. Christopher. Carpenter in Louisville in 1850.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, District 3, p. 329; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, Ward 8, p. 51; Find A Grave, "John S. Christopher (1806-1886)," Memorial #108690384, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=108690384 (accessed June 21, 2017).
